ctx: intros f g x y H1 H2 eps.
intros f g x y H1 H2 eps.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R -> R x, y : R H1 : locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y H2 : forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y eps : posreal Unable to unify "exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> (fun u0 v0 : R => Rabs (f u0 v0 - f x y) < ?M2363) u v" with "exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> (fun u0 v0 : R => Rabs (g u0 v0 - g x y) < eps) u v".

ctx: intros f g x y H1 H2 eps.

original: intros f g x y H1 H2 eps. unfold continuity_2d_pt in *. intros H3. apply H2. intros eps'. specialize (H3 eps'). destruct H3 as [delta H3]. exists delta. intros u v Hu Hv. apply H3. apply H1. apply Hu. apply Hv.
